name: Remove Other's Clothing
description: Remove a piece of someone else's topmost clothing. MULTI-TARGET ACTION: Shows ALL topmost clothing items across all equipped slots. For a person wearing jacket (torso_upper), pants (torso_lower), and shoes (feet), this action will generate separate action instances for each: 'remove person's jacket', 'remove person's pants', 'remove person's shoes'. This is the correct behavior - users should see all accessible clothing items they can interact with.

primary.description: The person whose clothing to remove

prerequisites.failure_message: You need both hands free to remove someone else's clothing.
